name: DownwardRaysBackground
description: Atmospheric light rays emanating from top center directly downward with blur and radial gradient effects, with optional grid overlay.

propsSchema.animated: boolean - Required. When true, rays animate with pulsing opacity. When false, rays display static opacity.
propsSchema.showGrid: boolean - Required. When true, displays a grid overlay fading from top center. When false, no grid is shown.

dont: Do not use more than 4 items
